Author: grossenten98
Text: It all depends on where you are in getting better. Early on, you’ll want to binge like a monster but later on you won’t as much. What I did was eat the same amount every single day for 30 days as a challenge. I only ate just under my maintenance. After the 30 days of forcibly sticking to that, I couldn’t force myself to binge, it seemed awful. If you can keep a steady consistent intake for at least that long, you should be alright
